name: Wii Lounge
description:
Made in 4-ish days for the fifth MFFG Game Jam!

Create a Mii and explore the Mii lounge with your friends online!

Featuring a mostly featured Mii maker (unusable features are darkened and, yes, many of the hairs look very bad. I don't know how Nintendo did it). 

After creating your Mii, take it to the Mii lounge where you can look at a big tank, a piano, and a bunch of other things. Or, if looking at things isn't your style, try the obstacle course. 

Controls:

WASD - Walk

Shift - Run

Space - Jump

I wanted to use this game jam to refine my online skills for larger projects, which I believe was a success. Though there isn't much game, I'm happy with what I've made.
